#LOAD DATA
```{r}
dataset <- read.csv('dataset.csv', header = TRUE)
```
#ubah nama kolom
```{r}
colnames(dataset)[colnames(dataset) == "Ã¯..date"] <- "date"
```
#melihat struktur dataset
```{r}
str(dataset)
```
#menampilkan banyak baris & kolom dataset
```{r}
dim(dataset)
```
#melihat 6 baris dataset pertama
```{r}
head(dataset)
```
#melihat 6 baris dataset terakhir
```{r}
tail(dataset)
```
#menampilkan statistika deskriptif dataset
```{r}
summary(dataset)
```
#PEMBAGIAN DATA
```{r}
train_size <- nrow(dataset)*0.7
train <- dataset[0:train_size, ]
test <- dataset[-(0:train_size),]
#write.csv(train, "train.csv")
#write.csv(test, "test.csv")
```
#NORMALISASI DATA
```{r}
library(BBmisc)
normalize(train, method = "range", range = c(0, 1), margin = 1L, on.constant = "quiet")
normalize(test, method = "range", range = c(0, 1), margin = 1L, on.constant = "quiet")
#write.csv(normalize(train, method = "range", range = c(0, 1), margin = 1L, on.constant = "quiet"), "train_norm.csv")
#write.csv(normalize(test, method = "range", range = c(0, 1), margin = 1L, on.constant = "quiet"), "test_norm.csv")
```
